marklogic.body: OK, Here's my thoughts about the opening day lineup, based on spring training results. I also show their spring training BA. If AJ doesn't hit early, I would look seriously at Dirks in the 1 Spot and move AJ to the 9, so his speed could be on base when the top of the lineup comes up. I'd keep both #5 candidates on the roster, and use one as a long innings RP. That way, if one of our RH starters has a bad outing, we can bring a lefty in and make them go to their their RH bench players early.
